Quick overview of key terms/aup

1. No torrenting at all, not behind a VPN/proxy either, instant termination in most cases for this.

2. No tor allowed at all.

3. CPU cores are not dedicated, policy below.

4. Paypal subscriptions are optional, if you chose to set one up, you maintain it, accidental overpayments are held as credit not refunded.


Payment methods accepted:

PayPal, Stripe (credit/debit), Bitcoin.


CPU Use policy:

CPU cores are given on an equal share basis only they are not dedicated cores for your server alone.

In any 24 hour period you may use up to 60% of 1 core or equivalent over all cores, for example if you have 2 CPU cores that would be considered abuse at over 30% use on each cores for 24 hours, you may not burst to 100% of 2 cores or equivalent over more cores for more than 1 hour.


Any questions or custom package requests welcome.
